aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We are a pioneering healthcare technology company leveraging artificial intelligence to revolutionize medical diagnostics and patient care.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To empower healthcare professionals with AI-driven tools that enhance diagnostic accuracy and improve patient outcomes through data-driven insights.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the global leader in AI-powered medical diagnostics, making advanced healthcare analytics accessible and actionable for medical professionals worldwide.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Innovation, accuracy, and trust are at our core. We are committed to developing cutting-edge solutions while maintaining the highest standards of data security and clinical precision.

meetOurTeam.title: Meet Our Team
meetOurTeam.description: Our team consists of leading experts in healthcare, artificial intelligence, and data science, dedicated to advancing medical diagnostics through innovative technology.

0.name: Vache Aseyan
0.description: Vache brings expertise in frontend technologies, ensuring that our applications are both functional and visually appealing.

1.description: Vahe specializes in frontend development, focusing on building responsive and accessible web applications that meet user needs.

2.name: Artur Baghramyan
2.description: Artur is skilled in creating intuitive user interfaces, enhancing user experience through innovative design and functionality.

3.name: Arayik Avagyan
3.description: Arayik focuses on frontend development, utilizing modern frameworks to build efficient and scalable web applications.

4.name: Davit Mutafyan
4.description: Davit is an expert in frontend technologies, dedicated to delivering high-quality user experiences through meticulous design and development.

0.description: MediScanAI has transformed how we analyze medical data. The AI insights have proven invaluable for making informed clinical decisions.

location.title: Our Location
location.description: Visit our MediScanAI headquarters to discover how we're transforming healthcare through AI innovation
